title: Ticket #2963: DAGman  maxSubmits overrides maxIdle
description: BT reports that if DAGMAN_MAX_SUBMIT_ATTEMPTS is large and DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE is small, then the DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE throttle is basically forced to be the same as DAGMAN_MAX_SUBMIT_ATTEMPTS. This makes sense in looking at the code. Not sure that this is an error, as it can be fixed by setting DAGMAN_MAX_SUBMIT_ATTEMPTS less than DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE, but it is a surprise.
creator: nwp
